Class PublicationSystemGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • PublicationSystemGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class PublicationSystemGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Project #3 CS 2334, Section 011 10/9/2013

    This class represents a GUI which allows users to use publication systems.

    Version:
    2.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PublicationSystemGUI

        public PublicationSystemGUI(int width,
                    int height)
        Creates a GUI designed to allow a user to quickly access and modify a PublicationSystem.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the GUI
        height - The height of the GUI
        Conditions:
        PRE - width >= 520 and height >= 680
        POST - The GUI is ready to go
